headline: CenterPoint Energy Q4 Earnings In Line With Estimates, Revenues Rise Y/Y
summary: CNP's Q4 revenues of $2.26 billion miss the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 0.9%. The top line, however, improves 3.7% from the year-ago reported figure.
